title: Javier Bardem | Trump's Secret Positive COVID Test; GOP's Omicron Conspiracy Theories: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at Trump secretly testing positive for COVID before coming into contact with more than 500 people, including President Biden at their first debate, while Republicans and Fox News suggest the new coronavirus variant is a liberal hoax.

Then, Javier Bardem talks about portraying Desi Arnaz in Being the Ricardos, working with director Aaron Sorkin and learning how to sing and play the congas.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
